name: Bombcast 5223
description:
It's Bombcast 5223, and the brains of the GiantBomb crew are ready for their weekly podcast! Unfortunately, their equipment is quickly failing, so it's up to you to keep it running and keep their audience around for as long as possible!

AUG 9 UPDATE: Sound added to the game! Thanks to Silver-Streak for helping me cut & edit sound clips.
